summary: Uuno Turhapuro, a useless bum who has married money, creates havoc around his father-in-law's presidential campaign. He dresses up as his long-lost, wealthy brother from America, but things... See full summary »
cast: Vesa-Matti Loiri|Marjatta Raita|Marita Nordberg|Tapio Hämäläinen|Spede Pasanen|Simo Salminen|Juhani Kumpulainen|Liisa Paatso|Kauko Helovirta|Aarno Sulkanen|Olavi Ahonen|Aapo Vilhunen|Jukka Virtanen|Hannele Lauri|Pertti Palo|Pekka Autiovuori|Seppo Laine|Esko Roine|Mirjam Himberg|Rita Polster|Risto Mäkelä|Harri Kaasinen|Leo Lastumäki|Marjut Ollila|Mikael Sievers
title: Rautakauppias Uuno Turhapuro, presidentin vävy
